text: Smita Talwalkar (5 September 1954 â€“ 6 August 2014) was a Marathi movie actress, producer and director. She won two National Film Awards for the movies she produced; Kalat Nakalat (1989) and Tu Tithe Mee (1998). Talwalkar died on at the Jaslok Hospital in Mumbai from ovarian cancer, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie producers
title: Smita Talwalkar
